title: Basic Package Australia
subtitle: Affordable PR pathway for Australia
shortDescription: Comprehensive permanent residency package for Australia with expert guidance through every step of your immigration journey. Perfect for skilled workers seeking affordable PR options.
longDescription: Our Australia Permanent Residency Basic package provides complete support for your Australian PR application. We handle EOI preparation, state nomination assistance, skill assessments, and visa application lodgement. Our experienced MARA agents ensure full compliance with Australian immigration requirements and maximize your chances of success with personalized guidance tailored to your profile.
benefits: Right to live and work indefinitely
Access to Medicare and public healthcare

title: Supervisa Canada
subtitle: Long-term visitor visa for parents
shortDescription: Super Visa services for Canada allowing parents and grandparents to visit for up to 5 years with multiple entries and extended stay periods.
longDescription: Our Canada Super Visa package enables parents and grandparents of Canadian citizens and permanent residents to visit Canada for extended periods. The Super Visa allows multiple entries and stays of up to 5 years at a time. We handle insurance requirements, financial documentation, and complete application processing.
benefits: Visit Canada for up to 5 years

title: Germany Opportunity Card.
subtitle: Job seeker visa for Germany
shortDescription: Germany Opportunity Card (Chancenkarte) for skilled workers to search for employment with points-based qualification assessment and ZAB credential evaluation.
longDescription: Our Germany Opportunity Card package helps skilled professionals enter Germany to search for employment. This points-based system evaluates your qualifications, language skills, and work experience. We assist with ZAB qualification assessment, document preparation, and visa application to help you start your German career journey.

title: Portugal Job Seeker Visa
subtitle: Explore opportunities in Portugal

We assist with the entire application process and documentation requirements.

title: India Young Professionals Scheme Visa UK
subtitle: Work and live in UK for 2 years
shortDescription: India Young Professionals Scheme Visa for UK allowing Indian nationals aged 18-30 to work and live in the UK for up to 2 years.
longDescription: Our UK India Young Professionals Scheme package helps eligible Indian nationals aged 18-30 to work and live in the United Kingdom for 2 years. This scheme offers unrestricted work rights and provides an excellent opportunity to gain international work experience. We assist with ballot registration, visa application, and all documentation requirements.
benefits: Travel in and out of UK

longDescription: Our USA Visa Services package helps you secure visa appointment slots at US consulates in India. We assist with slot booking, rescheduling, and expedited appointment arrangements. This service is ideal for those struggling to find available visa interview dates or requiring urgent travel to the United States.
